Un juego que tuvo mucho hate al principio por culpa de los fanboys de cs 1.6 pero a√∫n as√≠ sigue teniendo una base estable de jugadores.

Respecto a la jugabilidad se siente muy c√≥moda, con un movimiento fresco y el recoil de las armas es f√°cil de controlar (esto puede gustarte m√°s o menos, pero a√∫n as√≠ es un juego que se siente muy c√≥mo jugarlo) y la verdad es que tiene much√≠sima m√°s esencia de Counter-Strike que CS:GO.

The hit detection on this game is quite possibly the worst I'v ever played. 98% of the time the shots are no where fu cking close to the player to register a hit. I tried this game after being told that the negative reviews and coverage werent fair, and boy was that bull sh it. This game, pure and simple, is trash. This game requires skill just barely above standing in line at the DMV and is more on par with a bad case of hemmoroids down a 10,000 mile country dirt road. The entire counterstrike franchise has been beaten like a dead horse more times than chris brown and rhianna.

I forgot how awesome CS:S is.
The graphics are pretty bad, but this game was made a while back, so CS:GO is a lot better. However, I enjoyed this game and found it quite entertaining in my spare time!
I totally get why people love this now. Clean, simple fun. Satisfying weapons, fast pace.

I like the look of csgo better but the accuracy and hit detection of cs:s is much better imo. I seem to get many more headshots and good plays in cs:s. There arent many players tho and some of the servers are pay2win in that the donators get infinite grenades and awp and often nade spam.

Classic multiplayer game. There are still servers up, it's easy to run, and the graphics aren't the best but they're still clean looking and really impressive for 2004.

Counter Strike: Source is a fun game, you have two teams with different objectives.
Gameplay 10/10 (Saving some hostages from a building filled with enemies? Count me in!)
Graphics 10/10 (Every Source game i have played has good graphics.)
Maps 10/10 (Every map is different, you have to use different tactics to take down the opposite team.)
Bugs 10/10 (None!)

This game is well worth the money.
